title: 'Dreamers' live in limbo as Washington debates immigration
text:
'Dreamers' live in limbo as Washington debates immigration   01:44 
Two roommates living in Brooklyn - who were brought illegally to the U.S. as small children - are closely watching the intense negotiations in Congress on whether to save the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program, or DACA.
